headline: Akamai Guardicore Segmentation Delivered 152% Return on Investment According to New Total Economic Impact Study
summary: Akamai Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cloud company that powers and protects life online, today released a new study showing Akamai Guardicore Segmentation delivered a total benefit of US$9.6 million over three years and paid for itself (i.e., payback period) in less than six months for a composite organization based on interviewed customers. Forrester's The Total Economic Impact™ Of Akamai Guardicore Segmentation also found it delivered a 152% return on investment (ROI) and saved more t
